de.ovgu.featureide.core

Class CorePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.runtime.Plugin
      • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.AbstractCorePlugin
        • de.ovgu.featureide.core.CorePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator

    public class CorePlugin
extends de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.AbstractCorePlugin
    The activator class controls the plug-in life cycle.
    Author:
    Constanze Adler, Marcus Leich, Tom Brosch, Thomas Thuem, Marcus Pinnecke (Feature Interface)

      • setupProject

        public static void setupProject(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                java.lang.String compositionToolID,
                                java.lang.String sourcePath,
                                java.lang.String configPath,
                                java.lang.String buildPath,
                                boolean shouldCreateSourceFolder,
                                boolean shouldCreateBuildFolder)
        Setups the projects structure.
        Starts composer specific changes of the project structure, after adding the FeatureIDE nature to a project.
        Parameters:
        project - project
        compositionToolID - Id of the composition tool
        sourcePath - source path
        configPath - config path
        buildPath - build path
        shouldCreateSourceFolder - true if source folder should be created
        shouldCreateBuildFolder - true if build folder should be created

      • setupFeatureProject

        public static void setupFeatureProject(org.eclipse.core.resources.IProject project,
                                       java.lang.String compositionToolID,
                                       java.lang.String sourcePath,
                                       java.lang.String configPath,
                                       java.lang.String buildPath,
                                       boolean addCompiler,
                                       boolean addNature,
                                       boolean shouldCreateSourceFolder,
                                       boolean shouldCreateBuildFolder)
        Setups the project.
        Creates folders
        Adds the compiler(if necessary)
        Adds the FeatureIDE nature
        Creates the feature model
        Parameters:
        project - project
        compositionToolID - Id of the composition tool
        sourcePath - source path
        configPath - config path
        buildPath - build path
        shouldCreateSourceFolder - true if source folder should be created
        shouldCreateBuildFolder - true if build folder should be created
        addCompiler - true if compiler
        addNature - true if nature should be added

      • getFeatureProject

        @CheckForNull
public static IFeatureProject getFeatureProject(org.eclipse.core.resources.IResource res)
        returns the ProjectData object associated with the given resource
        Parameters:
        res - given resource
        Returns:
        null if there is no associated project, no active instance of this plug-in or resource is the workspace root
